name: Andromeda Builder
description:
Andromeda Builder

Explore the surrounding environment by building units and collecting resources to build even more units.  Build endlessly till your heart's content. 

Andromeda Builder is a three dimensional endless builder game where players collect resources to build structures to create units to then explore the world. Players have limited resources and limited units to start, but can grow their army of units into some magnificent force for exploration. 

Controls
  • Change Camera Angle - Alt + Right Click
  • Move Camera - Cursor on edge of screen
  • Select Unit/Building - Left Click
  • Move Unit - Left Click (While Selected)
